numpy
pandas
streamlit

# Serialization
pickle5  # standard pickle is built-in but pickle5 is safest if you need pip
joblib

# Plots
matplotlib
seaborn
plotly

# Machine Learning
scikit-learn
xgboost
shap
tensorflow
keras

# Database
SQLAlchemy

# Utils
warnings  # built-in, no need to list
datetime  # built-in, no need to list
os  # built-in, no need to list
